Interface FirstOrderLogic<T>

All Superinterfaces:
Logic<T>
public interface FirstOrderLogic<T> extends Logic<T>

      T forAll(Iterable<T> domain, Predicate<T> predicate)
      Universal quantification (Ã¢Ë†â‚¬). Returns true (or equivalent) if the predicate holds for all elements in the domain.

    • exists

      T exists(Iterable<T> domain, Predicate<T> predicate)
      Existential quantification (Ã¢Ë†Æ’). Returns true (or equivalent) if the predicate holds for at least one element in the domain.
      Parameters:
      domain - the domain of discourse (iterable)
      predicate - the predicate to test
      Returns:
      the result of the quantification
